code | blank_info = 13-48288 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 0332295 | website = }} Mableton is a city in Cobb County, Georgia, United States. It became a city in 2023. As of the 2020 census, 40,834 people lived in the area. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:2023 establishments in the United States Category:21st-century establishments in Georgia (U.S. state)
